doc.name: HSMMMultinomialEstimator
doc.description: A hidden semi-markov model estimator, configured as an Explicit-Duration Hidden Markov Model (EDHMM) with multinomial emissions.
doc.author: Ilge Akkaya
doc.port: An output that defines a probability mass estimate of the multinomial observation probabilities.
doc.property: An input guess array that defines a probability mass, defining the multinomial observation probabilities.
Number of categories in the multinomial distribution.
